text: Stereocilia Vol. 1 is the first in a series of compilation albums by Credential Recordings. It features songs from Dizmas, Edison Glass, Future of Forestry, Lost Ocean and Turn Off The Stars. ==Track listing== # "Forever" by Edison Glass # "This House" by Edison Glass # "Open Wide" by Future of Forestry # "Twilight" by Future of Forestry # "Please" by Turn Off The Stars # "Hours and Days" by Turn Off The Stars # "Revolution" by Dizmas # "Riots And Violence" by Dizmas # "Just Glide" by Lost Ocean # "You Are" by Lost Ocean Category:2006 compilation albums Category:Credential Recordings compilation albums
title: Stereocilia Vol. 1
